document_data.name: M'tarl
document_data.deathnotes: (Transported into an extra-dimensional plane by [[Gromph Baenre]] in Menzoberranzan)
document_data.text: ''Alas," Gromph said dramatically, and Jarlaxle paused. "M'tarl did not survive.''
document_data.mainbody: To have a private conversation with Jarlaxle, Gromph transported M'tarl to an extra-dimensional realm.In the novel ''[[Siege of Darkness]]'', Gromph takes Jarlaxle into an extra-dimensional pocket and destroys a [[zombie]] servant with fire. While there is no concrete evidence this zombie is M'tarl, the question is still presented for the reader.
document_data.History:
In [[1358 DR]], while traveling through the deadly streets of [[Menzoberranzan]] seeking valuable information to help the organization's cause, Jarlaxle and M'tarl encountered [[Gromph Baenre]].

{{fq
| float  = right
| source = [[R.A. Salvatore]], ''[[Siege of Darkness]]''
| text   = ''Alas," Gromph said dramatically, and Jarlaxle paused. "M'tarl did not survive.''
}}
To have a private conversation with Jarlaxle, Gromph transported M'tarl to an extra-dimensional realm.In the novel ''[[Siege of Darkness]]'', Gromph takes Jarlaxle into an extra-dimensional pocket and destroys a [[zombie]] servant with fire. While there is no concrete evidence this zombie is M'tarl, the question is still presented for the reader.
